lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich secured a record fourth consecutive Bundesliga title, with a game to spare, on Saturday after a 2-1 victory at Ingolstadt 04 eased the disappointment of their midweek Champions League exit.

headline.print_headline: Bayern Win Record Fourth Straight Bundesliga Title
headline.main: Bayern Win Record Fourth Straight Bundesliga Title
